MarkdownFencedCodeBlock.code_block:
**DESCRIPTION** Installs a base image from a WIM file into the shared central image store for the Windows Server and Hyper-V Containers feature.
**PARAMETERS** ``` PowerShell -WimPath <String> A path to the WIM file that will be installed.
Required? true Position? 1 Default value Accept pipeline input? false Accept wildcard characters? false
